## loadPdfJs() function

Load PDF.js and return a promise to the global pdfjsLib object. Can also use `window.pdfjsLib` after this promise resolves to get the same reference.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export function loadPdfJs(): Promise<any>;
```
**Returns:**

Promise&lt;any&gt;
